packageMeta.name: purescript-react-redux
packageMeta.description: PureScript library for using Redux with React

declarations.comments: Type alias for a foreign Redux store enhancer, taking a `ReduxStoreCreator` and returning a `ReduxStoreCreator`.
declarations.title: ReduxStoreEnhancer

declarations.comments: Foreign Redux store creator function.
declarations.title: ReduxStoreCreator

declarations.comments: Type alias for a foreign `ReduxStore`
declarations.title: ReduxStore

declarations.comments: Reducing function that takes a `state` and `ReduxAction` and returns a `state`.
declarations.title: ReduxReducer

declarations.comments: Simplified `Store` representation passed to each middleware.
declarations.title: ReduxMiddlewareAPI

declarations.comments: Function that composes dispatch functions. Purposely restricted to dispatching `action` types here.
declarations.title: ReduxMiddleware

declarations.comments: Convenience type alias for the Redux effect.
declarations.title: ReduxEffect

declarations.comments: Allows `ReduxMiddleware` to wrap the `ReduxBaseDispatch` function to return a different result to be passed to the next `ReduxMiddleware`.
declarations.title: ReduxDispatch

declarations.comments: The `ReduxBaseDispatch` is the dispatching function provided to the store without any middleware.
declarations.title: ReduxBaseDispatch

declarations.comments: Convenience type for converting an `action` in this module to a `ReduxAction`.
declarations.title: ReduxAction'

declarations.comments: Redux actions must be a record with a `type` field.
declarations.title: ReduxAction

declarations.comments: Reducer that does not change the type of the `state`.
declarations.title: Reducer

declarations.comments: Effect type for Redux.
declarations.title: REDUX

declarations.comments: Dispatching function that returns a `result` type given an action.
declarations.title: Dispatch

declarations.comments: Dispatching function that returns the action it was passed.
declarations.title: BaseDispatch

declarations.comments: Connected class representation parameterized by `state`, `ownProps`, `props`, and `action`.
declarations.title: ConnectClass

declarations.comments: Connect class type alias for a class with no `ownProps`.
declarations.title: ConnectClass'

declarations.comments: Options that can be passed on calling `connect`. Additional options may also be provided as needed.
declarations.title: ConnectOptions

declarations.comments:
Redux connect function that depends on `ownProps`.

Redux will invoke the mapping functions whenever the connected
class receives updated `ownProps`.
declarations.title: connect

declarations.comments: Redux connect function that does not depend on `ownProps`.
declarations.title: connect_

declarations.comments: Effect type for Redux.
declarations.title: REDUX

declarations.comments: Convenience type alias for the Redux effect.
declarations.title: ReduxEffect

declarations.comments: Reducer that does not change the type of the `state`.
declarations.title: Reducer

declarations.comments: Dispatching function that returns the action it was passed.
declarations.title: BaseDispatch

declarations.comments: Dispatching function that returns a `result` type given an action.
declarations.title: Dispatch

declarations.comments: Redux actions must be a record with a `type` field.
declarations.title: ReduxAction

declarations.comments: Convenience type for converting an `action` in this module to a `ReduxAction`.
declarations.title: ReduxAction'

declarations.comments: Reducing function that takes a `state` and `ReduxAction` and returns a `state`.

declarations.comments: The `ReduxBaseDispatch` is the dispatching function provided to the store without any middleware.

declarations.comments: Allows `ReduxMiddleware` to wrap the `ReduxBaseDispatch` function to return a different result to be passed to the next `ReduxMiddleware`.

declarations.comments: Simplified `Store` representation passed to each middleware.
